item.title: About
item.description: Hi, Iâ€™m Heraa. I am a software engineer at Intel. Before that, I studied applied mathematics at the University of California, Berkeley. I am interested in the space where math, coding, and communication meet up and hang out. When I am not writing code, you can find me doing yoga, reading, or traveling somewhere new. And I'm happy just because.
